entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression in dotnet publish using .NET 9 SDK 9.0.200 #77388
  • Syntax highlight is missing for 'using unsafe' type aliases #77387
  • Calling t?.GetHashCode() in generic method emits longer code than needed #77386

Closed

  • IDE0040 description can be misleading #77384

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix unexpected exceptions #77385
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Improve performance of SyntaxReplacer.ReplaceNode #77314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77374
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: First attempt at cleaning up package load to do less thread switching during InitializeAsync #77368
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extensions: Resolve classic and new extension methods together #77343
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Adds lightbulb option to offer implementing `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Bump BCL references to 9.0 #76890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
